Articles.Content:
http://blogs.unity3d.com/2015/08/26/unity-comes-to-linux-experimental-build-now-available/ Not that I use it but I thought modders might be interested.

I tried submitting this in development but you need to select a prefix which apparently you can't do on the mobile site.
Specifically, the Unity 3D editor is now available for Linux.
Oooo! Less time in Windows for me! Now to finish the engines I've been working on....
I can finally mod now! Yipee! Calloh! Callah! Callay!
